price: (9) [Saying], "We feed you only for the face [i.e., approval] of Allāh. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innamā nuṭ'ʿimukum liwajhi al-lahi lā nurīdu minkum jazāan walā shukūran
